[English](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sz30/2048-magic/main/README.md) | [ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sz30/2048-magic/main/README.zh-CN.md) | [ÁπÅÈ´î‰∏≠Êñá](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sz30/2048-magic/main/README.zh-TW.md) # üéÆ 2048++ An enhanced version of the classic 2048 game, now with even more fun features! This is a little project I whipped up in my spare time‚Äîhope it brings you some joy! ## üéØ Game Intro 2048 is a simple yet addictive number-merging game. On a 4x4 grid, swipe up, down, left, or right to merge tiles with the same number. The goal? Reach 2048 (but hey, you can keep going for even higher scores)! **How to play:** - Use arrow keys or WASD to move the tiles. - When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into one. - After each move, a new 2 or 4 will randomly appear in an empty spot. - The game ends when there are no more moves left. ## ‚ú® Special Features ### 1. Undo Function - Made a wrong move? No worries! - Just hit the "Undo" button to go back one step. - You can undo as many times as you like, all the way back to the start. - Never let a slip of the finger ruin your game again! ### 2. Secret Cheat Mode - Enter the magic sequence: ‚Üê‚Üê‚Üí‚Üí ‚Üí‚Üí‚Üê‚Üê (left, left, right, right, right, right, left, left) - All tiles will magically turn into 128! - It‚Äôs an Easter egg, just for fun. - Pro tip: Cheating is fun, but don‚Äôt overdo it! üòâ ## üéØ Demo üéØ Play here: [2048.765431.xyz](https://2048.765431.xyz/) ## üìÅ Project Structure

Modo Trampa Secreto - Introduce la secuencia m√°gica: ‚Üê‚Üê‚Üí‚Üí ‚Üí‚Üí‚Üê‚Üê (izquierda, izquierda, derecha, derecha, derecha, derecha, izquierda, izquierda) - ¬°Todas las fichas se convertir√°n m√°gicamente en 128! - Es un huevo de pascua, solo por diversi√≥n. - Consejo profesional: Hacer trampa es divertido, ¬°pero no te excedas! üòâ ## üéØ Demo üéØ Juega aqu√≠: [2048.765431.xyz](https://2048.765431.xyz/) ## üìÅ Estructura del Proyecto

Content:
**File Descriptions:**
- `2048.py`: Backend server written with Flask, handles game logic and API requests.
- `script.js`: Frontend game logic, including moves, animations, and special features.
- `styles.css`: Game styles, making sure everything looks nice and responsive.
- `index.html`: The main page that brings everything together.

## üöÄ Getting Started

**Method 1: Download Release**
1. Download the latest release.
2. Make sure you have Python 3.x installed.
3. Install dependencies: `pip install flask`
4. Run: `python 2048.py`
5. Open your browser and go to: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**Method 2: Clone from GitHub**
Translation:
**Descripciones de archivos:**
- `2048.py`: Servidor backend escrito con Flask, maneja la l√≥gica del juego y las solicitudes API.
- `script.js`: L√≥gica del juego en frontend, incluyendo movimientos, animaciones y funciones especiales.
- `styles.css`: Estilos del juego, asegurando que todo se vea bien y sea responsivo.
- `index.html`: La p√°gina principal que integra todo.

## üöÄ Comenzando

**M√©todo 1: Descargar la versi√≥n**
1. Descarga la √∫ltima versi√≥n.
2. Aseg√∫rate de tener Python 3.x instalado.
3. Instala las dependencias: `pip install flask`
4. Ejecuta: `python 2048.py`
5. Abre tu navegador y ve a: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**M√©todo 2: Clonar desde GitHub**

Content:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/sz30/2048.git
cd 2048
pip install flask
python 2048.py
```
Translation:

```bash
cd 2048
pip install flask
python 2048.py
```

## üé® Customization

Want to make it your own? Tweak `styles.css` for a new look, or dive into `script.js` to change up the gameplay. All code is well-commented for easy hacking!
